\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsthm, amsfonts, amsmath, amssymb, mathrsfs, tikz-cd, tikz, ctex, mathtools}
\usepackage{quiver}
\begin{document}

% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}
	& K & {\mathbf{Free}(X)} & X \\
	{\tau_X} & {K_F} & {\mathbf{Free}(X)\sqcup _K K_F} & X \\
	& {K_C} & {K_C}
	\arrow[from=1-2, to=1-3]
	\arrow[from=1-2, to=2-2]
	\arrow[two heads, from=1-3, to=1-4]
	\arrow[dashed, from=1-3, to=2-3]
	\arrow[equals, from=1-4, to=2-4]
	\arrow["{:}"{description}, draw=none, from=2-1, to=2-2]
	\arrow[dashed, from=2-2, to=2-3]
	\arrow[from=2-2, to=3-2]
	\arrow[dashed, from=2-3, to=2-4]
	\arrow[dashed, from=2-3, to=3-3]
	\arrow[equals, from=3-2, to=3-3]
\end{tikzcd}
\end{document}
